title: The Grasshopper
description: Grasshoppers are jumping insects known for their powerful hind legs, ability to produce sound through stridulation, and their importance in ecosystems as both herbivores and prey animals.

questions.question: How do grasshoppers produce their characteristic chirping sound?
options: By rubbing their hind legs against their wings

questions.question: What type of mouthparts do grasshoppers have?
How far can some grasshopper species jump?
options: Up to 10 times their body length
Up to 20 times their body length
Up to 50 times their body length
Up to 100 times their body length
questions.correct_answer: Up to 20 times their body length
